title: Coronavirus: Evening update
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus outbreak this evening.
content:
Here are five things you need to know about the coronavirus outbreak this Friday evening. We'll have another update on Saturday.
1. Government 'cannot put a date' on a vaccine
